item.title: RTF doc analysis - part 1
item.description:
An attempt to lay path for rtf document analysis

Lore size xs

Don’t be fooled by its name, the text in Rich Text Format (RTF) documents isn’t gold plated or bathed in some kind of rare mineral pool (I know. lame ass joke – get used to it). The purpose of its origin was to serve as a cross-platform text format between Macintosh and Windows systems, and was developed by Microsoft in 1987.

item.title: IaC automated code security scanning via CI/CD pipeline - part 1
item.description:
I decided to create this post since I was looking to cloud in a security perspective and noticed this would be a fun thing to try and get hands-on experience in CI\CD and the magical activity of Terraforming, uh seems so cool and wizardy.

Objective

The objective is to create a Terraform config file with insecure configs on purpose. Test code security scanning tools, such as checkov and tfsec and then in a part 2 in the comming future, hopefully ;) time is an elusive thing, automate the process using CI\CD pipelines, something like Github actions.
